name: Iron Meat
description: Iron Meat is a run-and-gun shooter with an onslaught of mechanics ripped from arcade and console classics.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Scopes and Crosshairs Pack
description: Master long-range hunting with new precision scopes and a customizable reticle system designed for superior accuracy.

name: The Riftbreaker: Complete Edition
description: The Riftbreaker Complete Edition contains the core game and all available addons.

name: Royal Wars Farm TD
description: Royal Wars: Farm TD is a free-to-play tower defense game where strategy meets luck. Place randomly selected towers, merge them to unlock higher tiers, and defend your kingdom through multiple levels. Plant crystals, manage resources, and prepare for epic battles.

name: SM64 Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Mint Dodgers
description: Mint Dodgers is a simple game where this weird world that you're stuck in doesn't want you there! Dodge falling and flying mints, toxic rain, rocks, spikes, and so much more to come. Are you able to stick around long enough to defeat King Mint?

name: Pomo Post
description: Sin descripción

name: Off-Planet Dreams
description: is an invisible puzzle platformer where dying is feedback, death is information. As you move about each level, your mind will fill in the blanks and any deaths are simply an instant restart showing you where

name: Castaway Samurai
description: Inspired by the real story of Manjirō Nakahama, live the experience of a lone samurai survivor struggling for their life using everything at their disposal.

name: Propeller Rat
description: Pilot a propeller-strapped rat through increasingly challenging, hazard-filled worlds with

name: Number Line
description: Sin descripción

name: Goblin in the Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Spilled Mushrooms
description: Spilled Mushrooms is a card puzzle game with quick and charming puzzles. Using a small deck of critter cards, you need to strategically collect every mushroom from each region within a short number of turns. Each card has its own unique behaviors that can combo with - and against - other cards, leading to a complex system of synergies and sticky situations. Puzzles are procedurally generated, meaning every delivery is a completely one-of-a-kind challenge with at least one solution. While most of your deliveries can be completed with ease, some of them may leave you scrambling to collect that last mushroom!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Sonic and Shadow Skins
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Ultimate Edition
description:
This version contains the base game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge and the DLCs :

- Dimension Shellshock
- Radical Reptiles

name: Beardbarians
description: Prepare your hair!

name: The Jungle Book: New Wonder Adventures
description: In this visual novel, Mogli, a curious and brave young man, finds himself stranded on a mysterious island after an unexpected storm.

name: Bleach: Soul Puzzle
description: A Bleach themed puzzle game for mobile devices.

name: Apartment 606
description: Begin your new night shift working from home, but beware, this apartment harbors dark secrets. Can you survive all five harrowing nights?

name: Hope of Taru
description: Find the hints to your past and bring back life to your village in this small indie 2D platformer. Enjoy stunning artwork and an original soundtrack while unravelling the story of the mysterious village Taru in six increasingly challenging levels.

name: No Ducks Given
description: Indie mix of a Math Puzzles & Tower Defense. Use you brrraaain and fast calculation skills to defend friendly fowl agains the hungry monsters! Explore 8 different Levels, face 8 awesome Bosses and complete this crazy story!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Radical Reptiles
description:
A powerhouse duo teams up with the Turtles for another bodacious ride! In this final content update for Shredder’s Revenge, your favorite ninja squad are joined by two fan-favorite characters from the classic 1987 TV show, Mondo Gecko and Mona Lisa! The radical reptiles are finally ready for their playable debut in a beat-em-up video game and a long-awaited reunion with the gang.

The coolest reptile on wheels, Mondo Gecko, joins the fight: use his skateboard tricks to shred through Foot soldiers and rack up extreme scores! Mondo can perform mid-air dodges with his board, making him the only character with this unique skill.

name: Remnant II: The Dark Horizon
description:
A return to N’Erud uncovers a mysterious place preserved in time, where alien farmlands are tended by robots for inhabitants who have long since perished. But time corrupts all, and rogue AI and robotic creations threaten at every turn while travelers search for the secrets of the colossal entity that dominates the skyline.

Features
- New storyline, dungeons and area based in the world of N’Erud
- New Archetype - The Warden
- Many items and powerful weapons that enhance gameplay
- New bosses, characters and fearsome creatures

name: MX Dirt Bike: Unlimited Bike Experience
description: Sin descripción

name: Classic Racing Pack: Moto Roader MC + Rider's Spirits
description: ~ Moto Roader MC + Rider's Spirits ~

name: Gabenwood 3: 99 Hidden Yen
description: New adventure in finding objects at the parallel universe. Gabenwood needs you! Journey to alternative Asia to find all anomalies and save the World from destruction.

name: [Redacted] Techbase
description: ******** Techbase is a new apolitical version of THATCHER'S TECHBASE that everyone can enjoy!

name: Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops
description:
In a world where chickens have had enough of being served up on platters, one fearless fowl rises to lead the resistance against the fast-food giant known as FCK. Welcome to "Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops", the action-packed adventure where feathers fly and the claws come out!

Take control of a courageous chicken armed to the beak with an arsenal of weapons, from egg launchers to poultry-powered rockets. Embark on an epic quest through a variety of vibrant environments, from bustling city streets to the heart of the FCK empire. Prepare for intense battles against waves of crispy adversaries, including Major Fanders.

Join the resistance, cluck up your courage, and embark on an egg-citing adventure to save chicken-kind from the clutches of the fast-food industry. It's time to show FCK who is the boss!

name: Gladiator Of Valor
description: "Enter the arena in 'Gladiator of Valor,' a thrilling hack and slash adventure in the underworld colosseum. Play as Arcus, Zeus's son, battling fierce demons, orcs, undead, and mythical creatures. Face epic challenges and prove your might in this intense, action-packed journey for glory!"

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Story Expansion
description:
A New Reign of Khaos unfolds in Liu Kang's Era.

The Khaos Reigns Story Expansion continues the Mortal Kombat 1 story and is exclusive to the Khaos Reigns Expansion package.
Also available through the Khaos Reigns bundle which includes the Khaos Reigns Expansion and Kombat Pack 1.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Noob Saibot
description: Noob Saibot has been announced as a playable DLC character in the Khaos Reigns expansion.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Sektor
description:
A gender swapped version of Sektor from an alternate timeline has been announced as a playable DLC character in the Khaos Reigns expansion.

The original version of Sektor is part of the base game's Kameo roster.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Cyrax
description:
A gender swapped version of Cyrax from an alternate timeline has been announced as a playable DLC character in the Khaos Reigns expansion.

The original version of Cyrax is part of the base game's Kameo roster.

name: Stick It!
description: It's a challenging platform climbing game featuring sticks as playable characters, which can be played with friends.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Expansion
description:
Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns Expansion will include the Khaos Reigns Story Expansion and functions as the Kombat Pack 2 bundle, which won't be available separately.

The characters Noob Saibot, Cyrax and Sektor will be available when the expansion launches on September 24th while Ghostface (Scream Franchise), T-1000 (Terminator 2) and Conan the Barbarian will be available later on with a 1 week early access period as part of this package.

name: No Ghost in Circus Caravan
description: It's a small... somewhat eerie circus caravan. Each round lasts a few minutes, leading to numerous endings. Unravel the mysteries and control the outcomes. In the end, you might just hold it in your hands...

name: Maze Keeper
description: You are the guardian of a cursed labyrinth and must prevent an adventurer from escaping with the help of your monsters. But the adventurer keeps trying again and again, accumulating levels and getting stronger... Survive to the highest possible level !

name: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed - Costume Pack
description:
The Official Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed Costume Pack, including 3 nostalgic Mickey Mouse costumes to try on and start adventuring across the fantastical world of Wasteland!

Included in the Costume Pack:
- Steamboat Willie
- Brave Little Tailor
- Football

name: HiPurrLand
description: Hundreds of cats and fifteen brand-new levels await your exploration!

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Terry
description:
Terry is the second DLC character in the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A passionate fighter that hones his craft as he travels all over the world. Also known as the "Hungry Wolf". He came to Metro City after hearing about the opening of the Pao Pao Cafe.

name: BreakBall
description: Shoot your friends with balls that bounce off walls in this fast-paced tactical arena fighter. Discover dozens of modifiers and millions of combinations, and beat your friends by being the fastest to adapt to the ever-changing rules!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Void Shadows
description: “Void Shadows” is the first DLC for Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, offering a massive amount of content with about 15 hours of gameplay and a new romanceable companion.

name: Skyward Extraction
description: A light horror adventure through a post apocalyptic world, with airships.

name: Seaburn
description: Seaburn is a choice-based political simulator where your choices affect the future of the planet. Play as a policymaker as you sign legislations, respond to events, and attend interviews with drama-seeking journalists. Try to balance your popularity with the environment's health.

name: Crusader Kings III: Roads to Power
description: The glory and might of the Byzantine Empire are yours to command! With new governing systems, new ways to climb the medieval ladder, and new activities for your characters. You can also explore a new exciting lifestyle as a landless Adventurer, seeking fame and glory across the world.

name: Enemy Inside
description: Enemy Inside is a mix of action-strategy-racing-and RPG. A game that immerses the player in difficult combat situations from which there is no clear way out and a 100% guarantee of survival.

name: Beyond Galaxyland
description: Take to the stars in the retro-futuristic adventure-RPG, Beyond Galaxyland! Spanning the very cosmos, join Doug and his plucky, gun-toting guinea pig, Boom Boom, on an exhilarating, planet-hopping journey to save Earth itself.

name: Only Pinball
description: At 'Only Pinball' you can expect pinball tables in the style of the 80s, 90s and modern. You get realistic physics, elaborately modeled tables, atmospheric lighting, high-quality sounds and exciting themes.

name: Pawsome Hidden Cats: Kittynawa
description: Discover "Kittynawa", where hidden cats, quests, and puzzles await in a highly interactive, hand-drawn world. Choose your path, interact with everything, and uncover secrets in this enchanting adventure. Your curiosity is the key!

name: Fading Echoes
description: A group of guards are charged with defending the royal wedding. Unfortunately for them, this event attracts threats. An incredible adventure awaits them, where they will discover the secrets that lie in their lands, in their legends, and in the dark force that threatens to destroy them.

name: Chromacell
description: In this sideways scrolling shmup, take control of your spaceship and navigate through vibrant pixelated environments filled with hordes of enemy spacecraft. Upgrade your ship and weapons, dodge enemy fire while blasting through each stage. Emerge victorious as the ultimate space pilot!

name: Dark Sky
description: Lead a party of unlikely heroes as they uncover the truth behind a planetary catastrophe in this immersive turn-based RPG. Craft and upgrade character cards into powerful combos while you battle your way through this beautifully hand-drawn alien world!

name: The Forever Winter
description: The Forever Winter is a co-op tactical survival horror shooter where you and your squad must loot the dead to survive under the shadow of terrifying and gargantuan war machines locked in a never-ending conflict.

name: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed
description: Embark on a magical journey in Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Shape your adventure with the stroke of a brush and transform Wasteland as Mickey Mouse in this beautifully recreated 3D platformer.

name: Kepler-2100
description: Kepler 2100 is an interstellar-themed strategy game

name: SomnaBuster
description:
If the dream is real to you, it is worth fighting for!

Accounting student Macy is down on her luck and out of her mind, but her life of hum-drum is abruptly interrupted by a visit from a mysterious firefly. After stumbling down a seemingly endless hole, she wakes up in a strange new world. With an explosive broom in tow, Macy sets out discover the mysteries of Esperanto and find her way home.

name: Spava
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of dreams, where each location is a unique story. Explore dreams, free them from nightmares, and restore comfort and harmony to this magical area of imagination.

name: The Puzzle Maker: Cebba's Odyssey
description: Solve and create fantastical puzzles in The Puzzle Maker: Cebba's Odyssey! Follow the tale of Cebba the Puzzle Maker as you take on her many trials to inherit her title. Use the unique abilities of friendly units to manipulate and destroy enemy monsters. Become the next great Puzzle Maker!

name: Deja Vu: The Backrooms
description: Deja Vu: The Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op exploration game set in procedurally generated levels. Traverse diverse scenarios, with unique entry points, entities and levels, as you aim to reach the end of each journey.

name: Bloomtown: A Different Story
description: Bloomtown: A Different Story is a narrative JRPG mixing turn-based combat, monster taming and social RPG set in a seemingly pleasant 1960s Americana world. Join Emily and her group of friends to save their cozy town from the demonic creatures that live in the hearts of its residents!

name: Vampire Memories
description: Introduction: In STG's game, recall one story after another with simple descriptions;

name: Echo Point Nova
description: Satisfying first person combat meets classic adventure game. Featuring singleplayer and online co-op. By the creators of Severed Steel.

name: Cyberwar: Neon City
description: Explore a cyberpunk universe where monkeys rule. Challenge the fearsome Cyber Monkeys as you take on the role of a hero armed with a living shark weapon.

name: Worlds of Aria
description: Lead your own adventuring party on an epic exploit inspired by tabletop role-playing games. Invite your friends to the group with the Friends Pass, or strike out on your own. Collaboration, betrayal, and the luck of the dice…what wild escapades will you and your companions embark on?

name: Ara: History Untold
description:
Build a nation and lead your people throughout history to the pinnacles of human achievement as you explore new lands, develop arts and culture, conduct diplomacy, and go head-to-head with your rivals to prove you are the greatest ruler ever known.

Featuring both familiar and innovative gameplay mechanics, Ara: History Untold delivers an evolution in historical grand strategy with no pre-set paths to victory, leading to endless possibilities. Your choices will define the world you create, your experience, and your legacy.

name: GreedFall II: The Dying World
description:
The story starts three years before the events of the first game and the adventures of De Sardet.

This time you play as a native of Teer Fradee, uprooted by force from your island and taken to the continent of Gacane, where the colonists are from. In this old world ravaged by war and scarred by the Malichor plague and the political scheming of the different factions, you need to regain your freedom and control of your own destiny. Using diplomacy, cunning or combat, as well as help from allies you make, it's up to you to end one man's ambitions of conquest, which could spell the end for the continent and your island.

Experience the unique world of GreedFall again by exploring the old continent! Travel across new landscapes, from Olima – the city of stars of the Bridge Alliance – to the shores of Uxantis, and uncover the secrets of these ancient lands. Meet all the factions that share control over these nations and navigate the treacherous waters of their schemes and conspiracies.

Create your own character and find allies to join your team. Help them with their quests, uncover their secrets and make them your friends, rivals or even lovers. As well as equipping them the way you want, you can also take control of them in combat.

Immerse yourself in an ever deeper RPG experience where every choice has an impact on your adventure and where diplomacy, manipulation, infiltration and combat are all viable paths for you to achieve your aims.

name: Nigate Tale
description: Fight your way through a procedurally generated labyrinthic castle in this roguelike dungeon crawler set in a vibrant, colorful anime world. Your plane crashed into a magic fortress out of space and time — fortunately, the monster girls that dwell in this place will help you get back home with her powers... if you bring them the right presents!

name: Cyberwar
description: Explore a vast and technological world. Fight the fearsome cyber monkeys in a battle that can decide the future of the human race.

name: Distant
description: Imagine yourself diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. How would you see the world? What emotions would you experience? What would your symptoms look like? Answer these questions yourself by playing in the shoes of someone with the disease, first-person.

name: A Robot's Tiny Adventure
description: A Robot's Tiny Adventure is a calming, short and peaceful game where you take on the role of a tiny robot created to help others. Explore a small open world at your own pace, interact with NPCs and help them solve their problems, while enjoying a relaxing experience focused on exploration.

name: The Beast in the Silent Valley
description: A forgotten village, cut off from civilization, had a curse that would bring only death and fear. Gravets, in the role of the most soulful mandrivka, finds himself in this village, where all the bastards have become deprived of a trace of their thirst.

name: Mizi No!: Everyday Objects
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.

The "Everyday Objects" DLC contains 20 colorful everyday objects that Mizi will happily knock over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

name: Doner Master Simulator
description: "Run your own döner restaurant in Döner Master Simulator! Prepare delicious döner, satisfy your customers, and grow your business. Become a master döner chef and own the most popular spot in town!"

name: Horoboshi Hime
description: Sin descripción

name: Ex Terra
description: Lock and Release! A PICO-8 caravan shmup. Reach the core. Defend the Earth!

name: Rally Arcade Classics
description: Rev up your engines, it's almost time to race back to the past with Rally Arcade Classics! Including 44 iconic cars from the 70's, 80's, 90's and 00's, and 48 thrilling tracks to rev up their engines to the max while drifting every close turn, you will never run out of challenges to take upon.

name: From The Dust
description: From The Dust is a fun and dynamic shoot'em up action game! Requiring reflexes and motor coordination. Fight steampunk machines to save your village. Can you complete this challenge?

name: Gary's Fortune Telling Tent
description: Sin descripción

name: Ptolomaea
description: A short abstract & liminal horror game for GBJam12. Made in 5 days.

name: Snake 1
description:
SNAKE 1 is a fast-paced one-button game.

Play Snake with just one button. Collect coins to score points and to make the snake grow in size. Press a button to rotate 90 degrees. You rotate clockwise initially, but you reverse your direction every time you collect a coin.

The game is over when you hit any of the borders of the screen or the snake hits its tail.

name: FlipBook: Canvas Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: FlipBook: Canvas Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Ultra Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Winnie the Pooh: Honey for All
description: In this visual novel, a mysterious event occurs in the Hundred Acre Wood. Pooh and his friends spring into action when they discover that the honey has disappeared.

name: Cidadão de SP Simulator
description: Adapted from Molleindustria's The New York Times Simulator, Cidadão de SP Simulator is a newspaper simulator where you assume the role of a newly hired editor. To keep your job, you have to make three layers of society happy: The rich, Israel and the police.

name: Cazzarion: Drone Flight
description: Fly through gates in a landscape with a drone and increase your high score

name: Terracrest
description: A data retrieval mission down in the evacuated Mine 41-A. This is a short experiance that can be beaten within an hour.

name: DanLab's Golf
description: The most extravagant 3D golf game of the moment!

name: Onikura
description: A fast-paced and challenging boss-rush with options to customize your playstyle as you progress. Defeat all enemies in your path with unique attacks, specials, parries, and abilities.

name: Pharaoh's Purse
description: An economy focused tower defense where you play as an Egyptian pharaoh seeking to reclaim his lost wealth in modern times.

name: Golfing In Aether: Cauldron
description: The fifth free expansion to Golfing in Aether, adding several new levels and new hat customizations.

name: Class of '09: The Flip Side
description: The final chapter of the Class of '09 VN series... this time from a different perspective! Join Nicole's best friend Jecka as you help her navigate the pitfalls of post-grad life! See what 2009 was truly like in this fully voiced interactive sitcom!

name: Everlasting: Tomorrow
description: Embark on a harrowing journey with Alice, a college student, and her classmate Adrian, as they venture to a desolate town in search of a special cave. Uncover the chilling mystery surrounding Alice's strange nightmares and their connection to the town. The horror awaits.

name: The Best Treasure
description: The Best Treasure is a precision platformer game where an adventurer enters a mystical cavern inhabited by felines. He must gather treasures as a bargaining chip to save his brother, transformed into an insect by dark magic. Each jump and climb brings you closer to the cure and the true treasure.

name: A Death in the Red Light
description: A Death in the Red Light is an adaptation of the critically acclaimed puzzle game of the same name, set in historic Amsterdam at its lowest point. The decaying city seems doomed, with landmarks blighted by junkies, criminals, and seemingly unceasing civil strife. The urban rot seems all consuming - can you resist it and solve the case?

name: Circus Challenge
description: Many people are afraid of clowns, but what scares the clowns? Dive into a nightmare world where you will face many risks in the ring. Be careful with every step you take and overcome obstacles to escape from your nightmare.

name: Beef Cat Ultra
description: Retro-aesthetic auto-shooter with tough handmade stages across several game styles. Choose from six total playable characters while collecting dozens of unique power-ups and rocking out to a chiptune-guitar fueled soundtrack.

name: Population Goals!
description: Mine, discover, and build to help your newly cloned citizens avoid traps and enemies on their way to the New Earth portal. Create safe pathways through many different biomes in this lemmings-like puzzle strategy game, on your way to meeting your Population Goals!

name: Far Horizon
description: Far Horizon is an action-adventure RPG set in the far reaches of space where floating islands, beautiful vistas, and alien creatures await. Embark on an epic adventure of exploration, ingenuity, and survival as you loot, shoot, and craft to forge your destiny among the stars.

name: City 20
description: Embark on a dystopian-tinged survival sandbox adventure where the world dynamically responds to your actions. Craft your own narrative through a series of choices, navigating harsh environmental conditions and organized factions, and delving into unsolved mysteries.

name: HomeNaut
description: HomeNaut is a puzzle platformer in which you spin the direction of gravity.

name: Why God?
description: Climb high up the Tower of Babel by swinging and dodging all the children of the Lord to be able to ask GOD in one once and for all because he has made you so horrible in a world 2D cartoony. Explore in the most frenetic way the sad but exciting story of our little Amalgama.

name: Golfing in Aether: Deluxe Edition
description: Includes the base game and the Golfing In Aether - Deluxe Edition Upgrade.

name: DPS Idle 2
description: The long-awaited sequel to DPS Idle. Collect cards, upgrade cards, defeat monsters, join guilds and hire heroes. DPS IDLE 2!

name: Food Boy
description: Food Boy is a wholesome pizza delivery arcade game that everyone can play! Ride your bike through different streets, try to keep balance, and avoid obstacles to make more deliveries and get the highest scores.

name: Void Strife
description: Void Strife is an intense, action-packed Bullet-Hell RPG with a twist: your weapons level up, not you! Choose and upgrade your weapons through each unique skill tree, but also choose who to betray and who to trust in this dark damn world. Your responsibility? Don't screw it up. People need you.

name: Rune Coliseum
description: A deck-building roguelike game with unique semi-real-time combat system. Step into the shoes of an ancient gladiator and do your best to survive in the coliseum. Combine various skills and equipment, develop your own fighting style, and defeat all the enemies to become the next champion!

name: Tomomon: Legacy of Light
description: Experience the best of both worlds with our monster taming game - relive the nostalgia of classic role-play games, while enjoying fresh and immersive gameplay. Capture and train unique monsters in stunning environments, and put your skills to the test in challenging 3v3 battles.

name: Merchant in Dungeon
description: This is a Shop Management RPG game. pay off his huge debts and get rid of his engagement to an ugly girl, Heracles came to the Devil's reign to make money! The city is not only not as scary as it is said to be, but also full of beautiful girls?! A year-long trip to make money begins... ...

name: Conquistador
description: Conquistador is an action adventure roguelike platformer with hand crafted and procedural levels. Jump, slash, and maneuver through thick jungles and ancient temples, collect items, abilities and precious loot throughout this mysterious action-packed world.

name: Ninano: Dream Ranch
description: Welcome to the ranch where you can raise various animals! Go to a competition with lovely animals and become the best rancher. Decorate your own cute and wonderful ranch. In addition, fishing, cooking, gathering, dating, and various mini-games are waiting for you!

name: Tiny Glade
description: Tiny Glade is a small relaxing game about doodling castles. Explore gridless building chemistry, and watch the game carefully assemble every brick, pebble and plank. There's no management, combat, or wrong answers - just kick back and turn forgotten meadows into lovable dioramas.

name: TinyAttack
description: Tiny Attack is an action roguelite game. Fight against hordes of enemies in procedurally-generated levels with distinctive themes. Loot items, defeat bosses in uniquely designed fights, and survive until you find the truth.

name: Maiden Cops
description: Maiden Cops is a Beat'm Up full of classic, arcade-style action and ass kicking. Choose among the gorgeous Maiden Cops policewomen, tackle crime in Maiden City and enjoy premium-level pixel art and a breathtaking soundtrack.

name: DreadHaunt
description: Join the hunts as 5 agents in this multiplayer Co-op & PVP about horror and deception. One of you will be possessed then become a ghost, and the others must survive the haunting!

name: Project Castaway
description: Survive, Build, Craft, Hunt, and Explore the pacific ocean solo, or with friends in this early access survival experience. Each island has its own unique resources with no two islands being the same.

name: Anarkade
description: Anarkade is a Multiplayer Arena Shooter with 2D platforming mechanics that features multiple weapons, randomly generated arenas, and humorously bloody animations.

name: Future Simulation World
description: Drawing on the existing real-world data and current state-of-the-art research and exploration results, and taking into account historical data provided by the World Bank, a streamlined and relatively sensible data model that outlines all possible options for future development is built.

name: Witchfire
description: Witchfire is a first-person shooter from the creative leads behind Painkiller and Bulletstorm. A roguelite for people who hate roguelites, the game offers a challenging but satisfying gameplay experience, and with multiple roads to victory.

name: Colorfuly Ball
description: In Colorfuly Ball, a simple yet engaging game, guide your ball to the right colors and overcome obstacles to collect points. This exciting game will test your speed and reflexes as you face different challenges at each level!

name: Central Standard
description: Central Standard is a short adventure game made for the 2024 $108 Adventure Challenge about a cook starting an apprenticeship at the hot new restaurant: Central Standard!

name: The Legend of Goose: The Honk Waker
description: The Goose is Loose and ready to honk and spread chaos across Hyrule!

name: Horoboshi-hime
description: This is a small and concentrated Roguelike RPG. It offers short but crunchy battles and powerful growth. It is a simple adventure that the protagonist alone takes on, but a series of profound choices are continuously pushed upon you.

name: Pet Clinic Simulator
description: Welcome to Pet Clinic Simulator, where your love for animals meets your management skills! Build and run your very own veterinary clinic in this charming, customizable arcade idle game.

name: Infinite Porridge
description: A great new take on the classic arcade game Defender from Williams.

name: Pup Panick!
description: PupTown is under attack! Help our hero defeat the enemies and guide him through this adventure!

name: Factor72
description: A puzzle game about multiplications

name: Gurk in Trouble: A Yip Quest Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Jex
description: Sin descripción

name: Arid Arnold
description: Arid Arnold is a classic puzzle-platforming adventure, explore 9 unique worlds, travel in time, talk to racoons, go to hell and back in search of the fountain of water. In one world you might be rotating the entire level, but in the next you will need to travel in time, there’s even a few levels where you need to coordinate with a clone of yourself.

name: Volcano Valley
description: 2 maps that were inspired by the Sonic 3d blast game for the Sega Genesis.

name: Expendable
description: A short, 10 minute single-player map for intermediate players.

name: Mario Adventure 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Foot Laser
description: Sin descripción

name: Astral Globetrot
description: A vanilla-compatible 32-map MegaWAD themed around space travel. After MAP11, there are four more episodes with radically different visual iden﻿tities that add new textures, and each map at least indirectly leads into the next one.

name: Nostalgia Zero
description: Nostalgia Zero is a set of 36 maps in CL3 for The Ultimate Doom. This WAD uses exclusively vanilla textures and vanilla limits, with the target source port being Chocolate Doom. In terms of gameplay and level design it’s much closer to the IWAD than either of the Nostalgia WADs, though it does sometimes dip it’s toes into more modern tropes.

name: PlayCOQ: The Coop Defender
description: Prove your COQ's might in epic battles to save the coop from numerous foes!

name: Eclectic Custom Night
description:
Survive 20 character in a mixed media world. Survive by looking by looking at cameras created by multiple people. act quickly in 20 preset nights. Do some challenges and look for secrets to unlock 15 fan skins.
Eclectic Custom Night is a fnaf custom night game that follows the idea of mixing many different art styles to make something that looks cool.
Fun gameplay for both new fans and people who want a challange.
Togglable hard modes and dares to make your game harder
Many secrets to find and search for.

name: Jigsaw Chronicles: Heroes of Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: For Hell's Sake
description: For Hell's Sake is a fast-paced 2D platform game where you play as a demon on a mission to break an old contract. Constantly hunted by a superior entity, you will have to move forward. Avoid the traps scattered around the world. Don't get caught. Don't die.

name: Battleship Avalon
description: Rebuild the remnants of humanity and conquer the Milky Way in this strategy game. Colonize systems and corner markets, or lead your fleets to victory in real-time battles. Reclaim Earth, or terraform new worlds.

name: On the Bubble
description: Inspired by classic platforming games, On the Bubble is an action-packed 3D platforming experience for fans of fast-paced games. The level editor allows anyone to make their own creations to be completed at breakneck speeds.

name: 100 Cats Mexico
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Mexico! Can you find them all?

name: Anomalous
description: A pixelated low fidelity 90s throwback hyper-fast action shooter. Survive and fight through a city overrun with manufactured monstrosities, biomass horrors, and a military authority trying to purge everything living. Featuring a heavy metal soundtrack

name: The Box
description: You just started your new job at which you have to break boxes. What could possibly go wrong.

name: Detective Beebo: Night at the Mansion
description: Detective Beebo is a Point-and-click mystery romcom with puzzle elements.

name: Horror Prison
description: Uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows, confront the monstrous results of these experiments, and escape with your sanity intact.

name: Lurking Darkness
description:
Lurking Darkness is a short, PS1-styled survival horror game about what happens if you get to close to the dangers that hide in the shadows...

On September 14th, 1990, four friends would enter the Greenlock Woods for an overnight camping trip.

Two days later, they were reported missing.

As part of a search party, your goal is to find any possible survivors. Keep your eyes peeled for anyone, and don't stray off the path.

name: Veil Transfer
description: An atmospheric, arcade first-person horror game where your sole job is to root out the Veils who take on the identity of humans. Interrogate and execute monsters that hide within people, and protect yourself while managing your ammunition and transfers.

name: The Tensor
description: Sin descripción

description: The chase is on!

description: Build, raid, conquer – lead your Viking empire to glory!

name: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3: I Opened a Portal to Hell in the Favela Trying To Revive Mit Aia I Need to Close It
description: Brazilian Drug Dealer 3 is a fast-paced ultraviolent Brazilian old-school FPS heavily inspired by the first Quake, using the same engine as the game (ID TECH2). made as a tribute to the Brazilian mods of the 2000s, the Brazilian bootleg games of the 2000s, Brazilian music, and the King of Brazilian music, Mit Aia!

name: Animal Battle Arena
description: Roll your tough fighting beasts into the arena and compete for the right to be the best. Even the cute panda can beat his rivals, and the turtle isn't so slow when it comes to the big animal fight.

name: Call Me Hero
description: Players will transform into the male protagonist Lin Feng, meet three beautiful women with vastly different appearances and personalities, and embark on an exciting love journey with them, becoming their heroes in the process.

name: Gelatina is Hungry
description: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatina and plow through the world eating everything you can. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Gelatin Is Hungry
description: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatin and plow through different levels and platforms, eat everything you can and avoid obstacles. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Rise of the Eternal
description: Rise of the Eternal is a 2D-side scroller developed in Unreal Engine 5. It has beat'em up aspects and boss battles. In Early Access players have access to the first level of the game as well as one enemy type.

name: Mario Adventure III
description: A mod of Super Mario Bros. 3, sequel to Mario Adventure.

name: Choppie's
description: A horror game where you have to escape a restaurant from a killer rabbit that has got a really sharp arm. Will you chicken out or face your fears?

name: Outbreak: Strange Shades Collection
description: Gore, blood, and death await in six retro survival horror nightmares!

name: Crisis Command
description: Blast your way through over 6 stages of mayhem to rescue civilians and push those robots out. Use their own powers against them and help reclaim peace to the island.

name: Waifu Simulator
description: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Hearts of Olympus
description: Break your curse, battle mythic foes, and fall for the gods in an epic tale of love and destiny!

name: Origami Angel: Feeling Not Found
description: The Nintendo DS release of Feeling Not Found, the third full-length record from the American pop punk duo Origami Angel.

name: Waternet
description: Vircon32 port of Waternet, which is a multiplatform water pipe puzzle game written for old consoles and handhelds.

name: The Final Exam
description: A game that raise awareness about gun violence and push for legislative reform by immersing players in the terrifying reality students face in America. The game highlights the horrors of gun violence and uses this shock factor as a call to action for meaningful change​ in real life.

name: Oktoberfest
description: Dive into the ultimate VR fun fair game, bringing the excitement and social buzz of the original Munich Oktoberfest right to your home.

description: In this visual novel, a group of penguins embark on an adventure on the ice, making friends and solving challenges.

name: Hot & Hentai
description: Step into the brand new version of the enchanting world of Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: World of Squares
description: A feel-good MMO with rich mechanics. Paint with your friends, play a cube violin in the woods, discover an ancient ruins, fight valiant knights and dangerous mobs, become a fox sacrificing yourself to a dangerous altar at midnight, chill with a fishing rhythm game, upgrade your gear and character.

name: Learn to Play Vol. 6: Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Halloween Pumpkin Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Devious Path
description: You are trapped in an endless astral world. Keep a close eye on your surroundings to get out of the astral world.

name: Bally Fears: The Introduction Game
description: You are a child named Reyes Spherikaw. Your mother passed away a few days ago, but Reyes doesn't know this yet. Your father has brought you to his workplace because there was no one to look after you. The game begins when your father calls you to warn you about something...

name: The Hellblade Bundle
description:
Embark on a journey of cinematic immersion in the Hellblade games bundle.
This collection brings together two critically acclaimed titles in Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice and its sequel, Senua’s Saga: Hellblade II for an unforgettable experience.

name: Seeking Cat
description: In "Seeking Cat," explore a cozy, cluttered room filled with cleverly hidden cats. Can you uncover all the hidden cats and become the ultimate cat finder?

name: Haunted Starbase
description: 'Haunted Starbase' is a single tech-base level for Doom 2 that makes use of OTEX and a cool pallete swap from AshtralFiend. It also draws some inspiration from 'Suspended in Dusk'.

name: Bring Me...
description:
Bring me... is a first-person anomaly-horror game.
Play as a young woman who has been caring for her sick father and has been trapped in an anomalous cycle.
Observe your surroundings for anomalies to find your way out of this nightmare.

name: Deckception
description: Deckception is a rouge-like deck builder with local co-op allowing for 1-2 players to conquer the endless floors. The game has one player using the keyboard which can control the cards in the game while the other player controls the mouse which can control the dice. How far can you make it?

name: The Icarus Experiment
description: Plumb the depths of a doomed leviathan on a mission to save a dying solar system. Unravel a mystery that could alter the fate of humanity. Created with Adventure Forge, this showcases the power of the no-code tool that lets you craft your own narrative-rich experiences.

name: HSS: Reload
description: This is a very fast God's perspective roguelike shooter, the player will pilot the mech, explore the alien frontier, enjoy the "Crimsonland + Vampire Survivors" endless killing!

name: The Pauser
description: "The Pauser" is a narrative adventure game, developed by a student who drop out to make games. Player can stack blocks or "pause" them mid-air to help the character pass levels.You can choose to watch "ads" to "speedrun" the game. But, is that really what you want? It all depends on you!

name: Buggy Off-Road Racing: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fashion Friends: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Value Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Home Safety Hotline: Seasonal Worker
description: It's 1996, and there's only three days left until Christmas. Rebecca, a yearly seasonal employee at HSH, has been brought back to help answer the helplines during this busy (and deadly) time of the year. Featuring the talents of Trevor Henderson, Longmont Potion Castle and more!

name: Galactic Guardian
description:
From the developers at The Jumping Food Games comes an action-packed endless game that catapults you into the depths of space: "Galactic Guardian". In this colorful, neon-lit cosmos, you'll battle enemy spaceships, destroy asteroids and collect as many stars as you can!

Neon-colored space: Immerse yourself in a breathtaking, glowing galaxy that impresses with dynamic lighting effects and colorful design on every level.

Endless fun: Destroy enemy spaceships and asteroids in an endless game that never ends - only you decide how long you survive and how high your score will be!

name: Moo & Move
description: Guide the hungry cow to its goal! Place directional tiles on the ground and choose to solve puzzles the easy or hard way—it's up to you! Watch as the cow follows your path to reach its tasty hay in this fun, kid-friendly game!

name: Jitaku Keibin
description: Sin descripción

name: Farm It: Funky DLC
description: Change your farmer's style with classy and funky clothes! This DLC offers a delightful range of new customization options to freshen up your look and transform your living space. With this expansion, you'll unlock 9 crazy hats and 9 stylish sets of clothes to mix and match, allowing you to express your personal flair. Additionally, you'll gain access to 128 awesome decorations that you can use to make your house truly unique. And to top it off, you'll receive 6000 coins to purchase everything you need to achieve your desired style and decor. Have fun exploring these new possibilities and updating your farmer's appearance and home environment!

name: Farm It: Fluffy DLC
description: Change your farmer's style with cute and fluffy clothes! With this DLC, you'll unlock 16 hats of different cute animals, 2 sets of panda clothes, 1 pair of panda shoes, 128 awesome decorations to make your house unique, and 5000 coins to buy everything you need. Have fun with your new style and decor.

name: Faaast Penguin
description: "Faaast Penguin" is an action-packed racing game where up to 40 penguins compete in a chaotic race to the finish. Players can unleash attacks, ride on ultimate rides, use shortcuts, and outpace rivals to reach the finish line first.

name: The Train Station
description: The Train Station is a short horror game developed by one person. Play as a stationmaster on a foggy night in 1940s England. Carry out essential tasks such as collecting lost luggage and cleaning toilets, but remember to attend the ticket booth when you hear the bell.

name: Ten Seconds Hero 1
description: Open world,RPG,Build,All Monster and NPC can be controlled.

name: EA Sports FC 25: Ultimate Edition
description:
Ultimate Edition includes:
- EA SPORTS FC 25
- Football Ultimate Team Player Loan Item
- Ambassador Loan Item
- Clubs PlayStyles Slot
- 250000 Clubs Coins
- Player Career Personality Points
- 3 ICONs in Player Career
- 5-star Coach in Manager Career
- 5-star Youth Scout in Manager Career
- Up to 7 Days Early Access
- 4600 FC Points (3850 FC Points on Nintendo Switch)
- Player Evolution Slot
- Early Access Rush Rewards

name: The Karate Kid: Street Rumble
description: Set in the iconic locations of the first three classic The Karate Kid movies, The Karate Kid: Street Rumble lets you step out of the dojo and into the streets of the 1980s San Fernando Valley and Okinawa. Battle waves of challenging enemies in this fast-paced, side-scrolling beat ’em up adventure, brought to life with colorful pixel-art visuals and chiptune music.

name: Armor of Doom
description: "Armor of Doom" is a TPS game with "tank vehicle" + "MOBA" gameplay. You will use famous active and retired tanks to compete on the battlefield. The game combines the strategic depth of traditional tank battles with the excitement of MOBA games, bringing an unprecedented gaming experience.

name: Matchbox: Driving Adventures
description: Ignite your imagination and jump into your vehicle to tackle missions and win races.

name: Ancient Savo
description: Raise a family in the pristine woodlands of ancient Finland. Manage your homestead, craft tools and items, barter for goods, live off the land. Continue as your offspring, start new homesteads. Plan wisely to survive in the wilderness where cold, hunger and accidents are your enemies.

name: Yesterday's News
description: Craft hilarious headlines with your friends in this 3-8 player party game. Score points by composing the wittiest headlines or by supplying the perfect words for your friends' creations!

name: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure
description: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure is a non-linear erotic visual novel set on a lost island inhabited by Furry tribes. The naive but courageous character - Maya is waiting for exciting adventures, dangerous and savoury!

name: Cosmic Paradox: Noire
description: Cosmic Paradox: Noire is a 2D top-down shoot ‘em up adventure set in a world of two overlapping dimensions. Witness the battle between the Vex Accord and the Oronix Empire, increase your odds of survival with the right upgrades and choose a ship that is best suited to your playstyle.

name: Trap for the Heir
description: Gwen is an experienced werewolf mercenary. One day, she comes across a simple and very monetary order. But who is her mysterious customer? And will it be so easy to get to destination alive? New friends, old enemies and maybe a meeting with love...

name: Whispers of Prague: The Executioner's Last Cut
description: Classic first-person point-and-click adventure game set in contemporary Prague. As a programmer and treasure hunter, you embark on a long journey to uncover the secrets of the infamous Executioner. Your task will be complicated by a sect of fanatic cultists and your own unexplained heritage.

name: Parking Garage Rally Circuit
description:
Retro Arcade-style Rally Racing in repurposed Parking Garages in big cities across North America + UK

You said "Parking Garage"?
The “Parking Garage Rally Circuit” tour comes into a city, selects a parking garage, and temporarily turns it into an exciting rally course for a week-long competition. Each track in the game is styled as a unique parking garage that has been turned into a race course.

Players will use a map of North America + UK to chart their course from track to track across the globe.
Rally... Circuit?!?

This is a hybrid of Rally and circuit racing. From rally it draws the jumps and “one racer at a time against the clock” time-trial format.
However, the tracks are similar to circuit racing, with each race consisting of multiple laps around the same track (the track may change slightly from lap to lap, however)
Controls are very tight, simple and arcadey, similar to Mario Kart (accelerate, reverse, steer, drift), but with a bit more dynamic “smash into things” physics.

name: Samuel Sage: The Mystery at Penby Inn
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling mystery with Samuel Sage, a young man who inherits a charming English hotel. Some would say he’s fortunate, but with a growing list of unexplained disasters and murder, has his luck finally run out?

name: Caution Ahead: Part 1
description: This is the first installment of a three-part series featuring a hide-and-seek type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

name: Bubble Wrap
description: The simple and fun way to relax!

name: Paper Kingdom
description: Paper Kingdom is a colony management game. Stack cards to gather resources, build structures, explore and fight invaders. Turn a nomadic tribe into an empire.

name: Rune Bender VR
description: Rune Bender is a fast-paced single player rogue-like VR Wave-Shooter in which players fight against monster waves from Slavic mythology to protect the shrine of the god “Veles” Draw runes to cast spells of different elements and shoot them wisely against "Perun" the mad god of thunder.

name: Bloody Hills
description: Bloody Hills is an intense and heart-pounding survival horror game set in the depths of a secluded forest camp. As night falls, you find yourself trapped in a twisted game of cat and mouse with a relentless killer known as The Hiker. Armed with only your wits and limited resources, you must fight to survive until dawn while evading the sadistic clutches of this merciless predator.

name: Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat
description: Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat is a rage fueling, adventure game, filled with unpredictable obstacles. Help Isani complete his impossible task, a task that was given to him by his maker at the moment of his creation.

name: Back to Dust: Hold it Together
description: You and your daughter are in a conflict zone and running low on food, you must travel to the border and try to enter the neighboring country. The path to the border is full of other refugees asking for your help. The more refugees you accept in your party, the tougher will be your journey.

name: Star Survivor
description: The last ship against the endless. Exterminate as many as you can, and gather points to upgrade your ship from a crafted deck of equipment and power-ups. Will your choices be enough to overcome the thousands hunting you? Survive the swarm in this rogue-lite + survivors + asteroids mashup.

name: Pneumata
description: The tenants are going missing, the screams are getting louder, and the building itself keeps changing. There's a serial killer loose in the city of Milton. Investigate the mysterious rumors surrounding Clover Hill Apartments and discover the terrible secrets that lay beneath the surface.

name: Alexandria IV
description: Tasked with commanding of one of the most challenging sectors of the galaxy, the future of the Alexandria IV space station depends on your diplomatic and strategic capabilities. How far will you go to prevent a war?

name: Just a To the Moon Series Beach Episode
description:
The Beach Episode of To the Moon, Finding Paradise, and Impostor Factory. Or is it?
...Yes, it technically is. Join familiar faces from To the Moon, Finding Paradise, and Impostor Factory in this narrative adventure filled with mini-games of varying elements, mysteries and relaxation, as well as... Wait, most of the characters here should already be dead.

name: Rats in a Cage
description: A corporate satire puzzle game. As a typical corporate rat, you manipulate your coworkers with coffee and gossip and take credit for their work in order to beat every level of a skill assessment test controlled by a rude AI that goes beyond the game window to stop you.

name: SS Survivor
description: The last ship against the endless. Exterminate as many as you can, gather points to upgrade your ship, and stack the deck in your favor. Will your choices be enough to overcome the thousands that are hunting you? Survive the swarm in this rogue-lite + survivors + asteroids mashup.

name: Welcome to Empyreum
description: Welcome to Empyreum is a local co-op party game up to 4 players. The main goal is to organize and clean numerous floors of the hotel with mechanics involving everyday chores (vacuuming or making the bed), and crazy tasks like taking care of alien babies and chasing ghosts away!

name: Spiral: Episode 1
description: Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside. It tells the story of Bernard, a man who wishes goodbye one last time to the memories that built him from his early childhood to who he is today.

name: Frostpunk 2
description: Frostpunk 2 is the sequel to the highly acclaimed, BAFTA-nominated society survival game. The age of steam has passed and now, oil leads the way as humanity’s newest salvation. However, with new threats on the horizon, the future of the city looks even grimmer than before.

name: Come Back Home Please
description: Trapped in an innocent 2D world trying to figure out what's going on by your own decisions! Prepare for one of the hardest and most frustrating game you've ever experienced. Play "Come Back Home Please" and unveil the dark truth.

name: Seasonspree
description: A game about nurturing friendships and celebrating the changing of seasons, where you play as Sunny, a cute little tanuki with the ability to control the flow of time just by walking around.

name: Lorn's Lure
description: An android is led through a vast structure by a glitch in his visual system. Lorn's Lure is an atmospheric narrative first-person platformer with novel climbing mechanics and modernized retro 3D graphics.

name: Spiral
description: Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside. It tells the story of Bernard, a man who wishes goodbye one last time to the memories that built him from his early childhood to who he is today.

name: Agent Mirai and the Submission Machines
description: Secret Agent Mirai received information that a certain pharmaceutical company is conducting illegal human experiments. She headed to the company to investigate on her own but was captured. In the laboratory, there were numerous sinister-looking machines. What will become of her...!?

name: The Death of Fo-gu
description: The Death of Fo-gu is a short adventure game made for the 2024 $108 Adventure Game Challenge whose theme was: The Dunning-Kruger Effect.

name: Puke the Pirate: Rebarfed
description:
The grossest pirate is back with a brand new remake of Puke the Pirate!
Revisit Spatter Island and collect as much of Black Barf's treasure as you can!

name: Andromeda Survivors
description: Master the Universe and Defeat the Invasion!

name: 30XX: Feline Fury
description:
Suit up with Dally's mighty Catastrophe Armor and crush the competition! This DLC unlocks Dally for use in-game as a fully playable character a full suite of unique weapons.

Dally's 15 unique rapidfire Weapons restore NRG quickly for use with her versatile toolkit of 9 unique Powers while charging up toward one of her 8 new devastating Supers. Combined with her special Mod Bell upgrades, her arsenal is 30XX's most diverse toolkit yet!

name: Fisherman Simulator
description:
Forge your path through the islands—Hunt for sea animals and other resources to make a profit. Buy and upgrade boats and fishing gear, and sail across the seas!
Tags

name: Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san Puzzle Party
description:
The first mobile game based on the 2024 anime Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings In Russian.
It's a puzzle game which uses characters and shots from the anime.

name: Night Hacking
description: An interactive story about hacking, unveiling secrets, chatting with people, and searching for purpose.

name: Sprout Valley: New Friend - Momo
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Storybook Nursery Kit
description: Surround new additions to the family with the elegance they deserve in The Sims 4 Storybook Nursery Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Artist Studio Kit
description: Design an inspiring space for Sims to hone their creative skills with The Sims 4 Artist Studio Kit.

name: Between Horizons + Lacuna Bundle
description: The bundle contains the full narrative detective adventure package for all you good noses out there!

name: Timore Narhelma
description: Timore Narhelma is a surreal experience about human mind and horrors within.

name: Anno 1800: Pirate Cove Pack
description: Let pirates take over your cities with the Pirate Cove Pack! Transform your coasts into swashbuckling sanctuaries with white sands, cannons, and shipwrecks, all thanks to over 21 daring new ornaments and skins.

name: Reign of Guilds: Commoner
description: Continue your journey throughout Dwarrhan with more possibilities!

name: Sprout Valley: Spray Paint
description: Make your dream of settling on an island and growing a beautiful garden come true. Your garden will produce many products you can sell and earn money. Remember to order unnecessary seeds, saplings and equipment to make your garden grow even bigger. Manage space on your island and pick the best place for your crops. Don’t forget to water them every day!

name: Highway Legends: Traffic Speed Racer
description:
Experience the rush of the open road like never before in Highway Legends! Feel the roar of your engine and the thrill of blistering speed as you tear through stunning, hyper-realistic landscapes. Every stretch of asphalt is a canvas for your driving prowess, and every turn is a test of your nerve.

Master the art of high-speed racing as you dodge relentless traffic and weave through intricate urban sprawls and sweeping highways. Customize and upgrade a fleet of cutting-edge vehicles, each designed for maximum performance and style. The stakes are high and the competition fierce, but only the most daring will rise to become a true Highway Legend.

name: Hentai Girls: Crazy Cowgirl
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Heavy Hand: Pixel Tree Forest Fury
description:
Dive into Heavy Hand: Pixel Tree Forest Fury, where pixelated chaos meets fast-paced action. Choose between exhilarating single-player challenges or a thrilling 2-player mode to test your reaction times and combat skills. Navigate through a vibrant, pixelated forest as you battle an onslaught of forest trees and obstacles.

Compete against friends to see who can chop, dodge, and fight their way through the verdant chaos the fastest. Whether you’re going solo or facing off against a buddy, sharpen your reflexes and master the art of pixelated forest fury!

name: Reasoning of Courage Nori 8 Definition of Kindness
description: Sin descripción

name: Zero Hour: Kill Zone
description: Nintendo Switch exclusive! High-quality graphics show battlefield reality. Team-based tactical gameplay with comrades. FPS with excitement and precise gun control!

name: Wukong's Child: Monkey King Myth
description: Embark on an epic journey as Wukong's child. Face mythical creatures, solve ancient puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the Monkey King. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime?

name: Arcade Archives: Crime City
description:
"Crime City" is an action game released by TAITO in 1989.
Crime City is rampant with evil organizations and criminal elements.
Serious crime is an everyday occurrence.
With the local police no longer able to cope, two plain clothes officers are called in: Tony Gibson and Raymond Brody.
Players take control of this duo to solve a series of crimes, defeating the criminals using with a variety of weapons and actions!

name: Hentai Academy: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Synth Ark
description: Step into the cybernetic future in Synth Arkt, where classic gameplay meets a futuristic synthwave vibe!

name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 4
description: A relaxing colouring by numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.

name: Eggconsole Star Cruiser PC-8801mkIISR
description: Become a bounty hunter and traverse the galaxy in your space fighter "STAR CRUISER" in this epic sci-fi adventure. Experience an space opera in the space!

name: Desktop Dodgeball 2
description:
Throw, Dodge, Catch! Grab victory with all your might!
Engage in intense battles in this new and improved dodgeball game!

name: Town Keeper
description: Build a rabbit town and defend against the Fluffy Empire. Strategically place buildings and manage resources as your settlement grows, facing increasingly challenging invasions. Each victory unlocks new ways to play, expanding your options.

name: Hooked On Speed
description: Race through 24 thrilling levels in Hooked On Speed! Use speedboosts, jumpboosts, and a grappling hook to hit checkpoints and finish the level as fast as possible. Unlock medals by beating record times, how fast can you go?

name: City Driver: Police Parking Simulator
description: A fun and realistic parking simulator that will test your driving skills in a police cars and other transport!

name: Freeland
description: Freeland is a virtual universe waiting to be explored, conquered, and shaped by your choices in this massively multiplayer online role-playing adventure. Immerse yourself in a colossal VR galactic online adventure where expansive open worlds teem with endless possibilities. Engage in quests that will challenge and reward you as you traverse this ever-evolving virtual universe. Unveil the rich storyline and forge your identity while connecting with players from across the globe through unparalleled social experiences.

name: Hero Guider
description: Hero Guider is a construction puzzle game. In the game the player is required to build a various facilities to connect the roads in order to help the hero go through the maze.

name: Robbery Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Japanese Rail Sim: Hakone Town of Natural Beauty and Hot Springs
description:
A Japanese Train Operating Simulator Featuring Real Footage!
Operate one of Japan's most famous mountain railways!

name: Blokdoku
description: Sudoku and block puzzle game

name: The Town of Nie
description: The protagonist is a young man named Hisora, who works several blue-collar part-time jobs. One day, he suddenly finds himself lost in a strange world. This is an otherworldly boys-love fantasy in which Hisora will risk his life to find a way back to his world.

name: The Mixologist
description:
The Mixologist brings the art of cocktail crafting to life in an immersive virtual reality experience. Whether you’re a seasoned bartender or new to the craft, the game offers over 100 real-life cocktail recipes to master in single player campaign or multiplayer co-op modes. Mix, shake, and garnish drinks with precision, honing your skills through intuitive and rewarding gameplay, or attend the bars as a patron and allow your friends to make your favorite cocktails for you in an inviting social environment.

Explore five distinct bars, each with its own unique atmosphere and challenges. From the cozy neighborhood pub to the bustling rooftop lounge, each venue offers a fresh experience, requiring you to adapt and refine your bartending techniques. As you progress, unlock new recipes and venues, eventually earning your place as a legendary mixologist.

The gameplay blends authenticity with arcade-style fun, making it easy to pick up, but challenging to master. Points are earned based on speed and skill, adding a competitive edge as you strive to perfect each order.

name: Sammy Jukes: Twin Lakes
description: Detective Sammy Jukes is the man on the job when an anti-oil activist is reported missing in a small town on the new oil pipeline route. Talk to witnesses, shovel through evidence, wrestle with the wolves and chase after chickens to find the truth in this first-person open-world adventure game.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell
description: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell - Haunted by his past, Mark explores a haunted house where nothing is as it seems. Chilling puzzles and shocking truths await. Are you ready to uncover the mystery hidden in the shadows?

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 3
description: This DLC includes a new Scenario, Character, Subquests, and Building Types content. Players can campaign through the Additional Scenario: Martial Arts Tournament, where they can liven up the party with the Additional Character, Milim. The game also features Additional Subquests, such as Valentines Day, Blumund Cooking Contest, Prepackaged Curry, and Beer. Additionally, players can sharpen Tempest with the inclusion of new Additional Building Types, including an Edgy Liquor Store, Edgy Tool Shop, Baron Goblin, Edgy Apartment Complex, and Edgy Armory.

name: Pixel Restorer
description: A retro pixel-style casual game where your task is to restore all the missing pixel images in the machine.

name: Cats Hidden Timeline
description: Cats Hidden Timeline is an exploration game in which you go back and forth between the past, present, and future to find cute cats and pet them a lot.

name: Cowgirl's Café
description: Welcome to Cow's Girl Café, an engaging incremental game that will transport you to a one-of-a-kind coffee shop. Your mission? Running a coffee shop where fresh milk is the secret ingredient to success, coming directly from two special girls.

name: Card Rogue
description: A roguelike RPG that you can play in 2-3 minutes! You get three randomly dealt cards, but you can only choose one! This is what happens when you distill the essence of a roguelike RPG!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series NyanxTech
description: Simple character control + stage gimmicks to be unlocked at the same time. This is a finger-tip confusing action puzzle. Challenge yourself with numerous difficult puzzles!

name: Falos
description: Falos: Learn to read 100+ words in 100+ languages while playing a game. A game where you match words to emojis across four different play styles.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Beat
description:
Over the Hood, Through the Streets - Beat from Jet Set Radio Joins the Rumble!

Roll with Beat in either Adventure Mode or Battle Mode!
Pick up Spray Paint Cans instead of Bananas as you skate your way through each stage.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Axel
description:
Axel from Crazy Taxi Joins the Rumble!

Enjoy playing as Axel in either Adventure Mode or Battle Mode!
As Axel, you'll be picking up Coins instead of Bananas!

name: The Neighbor: Escape Room
description: Do you dare to discover the secrets hidden behind the next door? "The Neighbor" will immerse you in a thrilling adventure filled with mystery and suspense. Set in a haunting house, your mission is to unravel its dark secrets before it's too late.

name: Tower Monster Rush
description: A tower defense game with brand new gameplay elements, innovatively combining the strategic tower defense with card battles.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster
description: Dead Rising returns with modern graphics! More than just a remaster, this Deluxe Remaster is a full graphical overhaul of the first game in zombie-slaughtering action game series "Dead Rising." This remaster has also been fully voiced, supports auto-saves, and has various other quality-of-life features. Witness the unmatched mayhem and freedom for yourself!

name: Kamai-tachi no Yoru 3
description: Sin descripción

name: DGGWare
description: DGGWare is a collection of meme based micro games in the vein of WarioWare. The game centers around streamer Destiny's community and covers topics from gaming, politics, philosophy, debate, art, culture and drama.

name: Sinister Mansion
description: Prepare to face your deepest fears in Sinister Mansion, a bone-chilling horror experience that will haunt your every step.

name: Space Vortex
description: Embark on an epic journey in Space Vortex! Hunt aliens, destroy their statues, collect black hole seeds, and access different space locations. Defeat enemies with asteroids in this thrilling adventure!

name: Death End Re;Quest Code Z
description:
A mysterious man appears, and the heroines are in danger. And so new protagonist Sayaka Hiwatari must face against a chaotic scene of friends and foes alike.

The battle against the upper world is about to enter a new phase…

name: Depths of Darkness
description: Your car falls victim to a horrifying attack at the entrance of the village. The owner of a nearby mansion notices you and invites you into his home. In this atmosphere filled with fear and suspense, explore the ancient mansion infested with creatures and uncover the dark secrets of the past.

name: Hunt and Fight
description: Hunt and Fight is an immersive action RPG. Explore the island, fight monsters, use various combat combinations to defeat bosses, earn reputation and find a way to get home.

name: Kozyrev Horrors
description: Step into the Kozyrev Mirror to unlock your Extra Sensory Perception. Beware: dread and horror await. Investigate to find an escape from this liminal space. Are you truly alone? A short and chilling singleplayer horror game, inspired by the Kozyrev Mirror experiments.

name: Hrumka
description: A rogue-like battler on a match-3 board. Match gems to attack enemies, avoid damage and gather collectibles. Use your level-up upgrades to become stronger and try different play styles. Be careful though - enemies can also level up!

name: CatBox
description: In this 2D puzzle game you will have to arrange your feline friends in more than 300 levels. Gradually changing locations will add new challenges.

name: Sporeborn Dark
description: Break out of a labyrinth surrounded by darkness, infested with growths and filled with disgusting monsters. Explore randomly generated locations of the experimental area to find something that will help you delay your demise. Dark, atmospheric, creepy horror roguelike.

name: Jianghu Road
description: "Jianghu Road" is an open-world side-scrolling action RPG game with a martial arts background. It has three key designs. 1: is a heavy dark martial arts plot. 2: a self-operating open world built by random NPCs and random events. 3:there is a "fist-to-flesh" horizontal version of the battle.

name: Dadlympics
description: Engage in physics-based fun! Conquer hilarious dad-worthy challenges with friends in the DADLYMPICS. Are you ready to claim the title of ultimate dad?

name: Project: Ahno's Ark
description: This game merges elements of tactical RPG, Go, and introduces Roguelite features. Players will need to make decisions among numerous random events and capability divergences, trying to survive in an apocalyptic game of mutual destruction.

name: Broken Sword: Shadow of the Templars Reforged
description: The classic multi-award winning adventure "Broken Sword - the Shadow of the Templars" returns with glorious 4K visuals and iconic remastered audio, pitching intrepid American George Stobbart and fearless journalist Nico Collard into a journey of perilous adventures and ancient conspiracies.

name: Hoptix
description: Hoptix is a movement playground game where style and speed come easy! Play as Rocket, a cyborg rabbit who is as cute as they are radical. Explore, race, and stunt on rollercoasters and skateparks in idyllic spaces. Share footage of your movement style with your friends.

name: Super Retro GP
description: Inspired by SEGA's Virtua Racing, Super Retro GP is a modern retro arcade racing game featuring a clean flat shaded polygon retro aesthetic with modern lighting effects to help it stand out without losing the retro charm.

name: Psycho Fear
description: Psycho Fear is a heart-pounding co-op survival-horror experience where players must escape to survive. Solve challenging puzzles, overcome deadly obstacles, and fight deadly enemies in an intense atmosphere, nerve-wracking and dark environment will keep players on edge.

name: Enotria: The Last Song
description: Enotria: The Last Song is a soulslike set in a beautiful sun-lit world inspired by Italian folklore where the brightest sun casts the darkest shadow. Wear unique role-altering masks, face formidable foes and alter reality with the power of Ardore to unravel the secrets of Enotria.

name: A Mirror Puzzle
description: "A Mirror Puzzle" is a puzzle game. Players will play as a water droplet spirit, through the use of various magic mirrors to control the symmetrical growth of plants or the position of certain scene elements change, overcome numerous difficulties, and finally reach the destination

name: Toy Tactics
description: A physics-based RTS game with a unique control system. Lead legendary warriors from distant ages in their quest for glory! Command your troops by just drawing your formations on the battlefield. Surround, ambush, deceive.. faster than ever! Your imagination is the limit.

name: Byte the Bullet
description: Get into my infected computer and restore every virus-ridden system by recovering game attributes like color or save functions. Enjoy this parody of multiple classic games from 80s & 90s.

name: Copycat
description: Copycat is a narrative-driven game that explores loneliness and belonging. It follows the story of Dawn, a hell-no-to-home-brand, pampered indoor cat living her best nine lives - until she becomes the target of an elaborate plan when a jealous stray look-alike steals her place in the home.

name: League of Fighters
description: This is the story of an abandoned baby who was accidentally rescued by two eminent monks. After he grows up, he goes down the mountain to travel the world. This game has multiple endings.

name: Beyond Shadowgate
description: The original design of the never-before seen point and click adventure is being brought to life after 30+ years in the vault - Beyond Shadowgate! This new massive PC game is being created by the designers of the original 8-bit hit Shadowgate and a leading 8-bit adventure studio!

name: Aura of Worlds
description: Aura of Worlds is a chaotic, creative tactics rogue-lite platformer. Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you utilize creative abilities & wield the environment to your advantage. Blast, dash, grapple, fight, and charm your way through ever-changing labyrinths & outwit powerful guardians!

name: WWE 2K24: Global Superstars Pack
description: The Global Superstars Pack includes Jade Cargill, Nia Jax, Kairi Sane, Michelle McCool, Dragon Lee, Lyra Valkyria, and Carlito with his shiny red apple as an added usable object.

name: Dark Elven Legacy
description: You are Elynar, the strongest archer in the Kingdom, who must face terrible creatures in the Great Dark Forest. Shoot with your bow, use a special power, or obtain power-ups during the game to fight various types of enemies.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Backlogged
description: Five Nights at Freddy's: Backlogged is an arcade-style bullet heaven game set in the Five Nights at Freddy's universe. Destroy waves of enemies, upgrade your stats, and ultimately conquer each round in this high-action new take on the Five Nights at Freddy's series! But be warned - it seems that something isn't quite right...

name: Just Platformer 100
description: "Just Platformer 100" is a platformer game that focuses on the pure enjoyment of the genre itself. The game starts with simple levels and gradually introduces new rules. As these simple rules accumulate, the game continuously takes on new aspects.

name: Phoenix Contract
description: Phoenix Contract is an exhilarating idle RPG that immerses you in a world teeming with adventure, mystery, and relentless battles. In this dynamic universe, you'll forge your legend by customizing your character, mastering unique skills, and embarking on epic quests. Engage in fierce PvP combat to prove your supremacy, challenge towering bosses for legendary rewards, and unlock the secrets of powerful heirlooms. Join forces with allies to conquer realms and shape the fate of the world. Your destiny awaits in Phoenix Contract—a realm where heroes rise, legends are born, and the adventure never ends.

name: Köy
description: Sin descripción

name: The Big Bell Race
description: Do you have what it takes to become the Big Bell Race champion?

name: Rock On! Island
description: Rally your cavemen and defend your cave from waves of attacking dinosaurs.

name: Mortol II
description: How many will have to sacrifice their lives to save Mortolia yet again?

name: Mini & Max
description: Mini and her dog Max are locked in the storage room. Harness the magic of shrinking to escape!

name: Onion Delivery
description: Can you survive the work-week in Zorrg city? Do your best to make deliveries amidst the chaos!

name: Party House
description: Can you throw the best house party of the summer without getting busted?

name: Overbold
description: In the notorious red arena, the more risk you take, the more money you make!

name: Pilot Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Warptank
