description: Use your tank to regain control of the station and sever all ties to Capsule world!

name: Vainger
description: The Vainger returns to Io and finds itself betrayed. The enemy must be found and eradicated.

name: Star Waspir
description: You are an elite member of the Star Wasps. Pilot your ship and battle the incoming swarm!

name: Seaside Drive
description: It's time for Pilot to return to what he does best -- Flying the Campanella through deep space!

name: Kick Club
description:
Sports are fighting over over who is best! Let's all play together!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Hyper Contender
description:
The daring, desperate, and indebted fight for money in the pits of Phogon.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Elfazar's Hat
description:
Elfazar is hailed as a great magician, but his captive animals are ready to strike back!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Divers
description:
Control Dylan, Orlok and Thyme as they explore the watery depths.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Cyber Owls
description:
A superweapon threatens to destroy the world, and it's up to the Cyber Owls to save the day!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Combatants
description:
The evil red ants have taken your land! Fight back and defend your queen!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Caramel Caramel
description:
Melon got a new camera and is going on a galactic adventure to try it out!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Camouflage
description:
Blend in with your surroundings to evade predators and fulfill your destiny.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Bushido Ball
description:
It's the annual Bushido Ball Tournament. Choose from 6 fighters and compete to win!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Campanella 3
description:
It's time for Pilot to return to what he does best -- flying the Campanella through deep space!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Campanella 2
description:
Pilot's gone missing on a giant spacestation and his sister Isabell is determined to find him!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Water Delivery
description: Water Delivery is a first person, horror experience where you play as a water delivery boy. Ride along in the delivery truck from house to house. Deliver filled water jugs, find and return empty jugs, and collect all the payments. Will you be able to finish your final route of the evening?

name: Valbrace
description: No knight has ever survived the journey into Gnothrok keep. What makes you think you'll be any different?

name: Fist Hell
description: The city has a zombie problem and the mayor can't be trusted to fix it. Time to grab your friends & fight!

name: Pingolf
description: Each year the best golfers in the galaxy show up to compete at the ufo invitational.

name: Devilition
description: Build and detonate chain reactions to drive the demon horde out of town!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 6
description: The Haunting returns and it’s more terrifying than ever! Introducing a horrific cast of Operators alongside the new "Drive Thru" Multiplayer map and six new map variants, the anything-goes Purgatory Limited Time mode, free Rift Runs in Zombies, plus new weapons, Aftermarket Parts, a frighteningly epic Battle Pass, and more.

name: Waldorf's Journey
description: Waldorf didn't go looking for adventure. He was just trying to enjoy a nice nap...

name: Golfaria
description: Deep beneath the fairway, a golf ball awakens. Where did it come from? What is its purpose?

name: Campanella
description: Fly the Campanella through five challenging worlds! And don't forget to stop for coffee!

name: Block Koala
description: Flamingus has stolen all the water! Solve puzzles to defeat him and save the park!

name: Lords of Diskonia
description: War has come to land of Disks, and the red and blue armies are on a collision course!

name: Porgy
description: Strange happenings near the coast! Dive deep and get to the bottom of what's fishy in the sea.

name: Rakshasa
description: Even death won't stop Jangi from avenging the destruction of his village by demons!

name: Rail Heist
description:
The most infamous train robbers in the west pull off a series of daring heists.
Takes place in the world of Lonestar, a setting also used by the game Grimstone.

name: Planet Zoldath
description:
Brave the wilds of Planet Zoldath in search of the intergalactic treasure map!
Though they remain unnamed, Pilot and the Campanella make their first appearance in this game.

name: Hot Foot
description:
It's time to grab your beanbags and settle your differences on the hot foot court!
Based on an actual children's game played by Smolksi and Chun in elementary school.

name: Avianos
description:
In a time when birds rule, an epic war rages between the red talons and the blue beaks.
Game available on UFO 50.

name: Velgress
description:
The space pirate Alpha is trapped in the deep pit known as Velgress. Help her climb out!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Mortol
description:
How many people will lay down their lives to save Mortolia? The first game in the Mortol series.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Attactics
description:
Carefully arrange your troops for maximum advantage in this game of realtime tactics.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Mooncat
description:
Jump and dash through forests, caves and mountains, in search of the egg. Conceived as a spiritual sequel to Barbuta,
Game available on UFO 50.

name: Grimstone
description:
Praise Biggan, the four of you survived the saloon fire. But somethin' tells me this story's just gettin' started... Almost two years in the making, this massive game was actually started before its thematic cousin Rail Heist.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Night Manor
description:
Trapped in a nightmare where you must use your wits to survive and escape!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Quibble Race
description:
Compete with the computer or your friends to earn the most money in a futuristic alien-horse racing game. Sponsor some of the quibbles or sabotage them to improve your odds.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Undertale: Act to Flirt
description: A new human has fallen to the underground two weeks after the events caused by Frisk, who mysteriously disappeared after being last seen in New Home. A lot has happened in these past two weeks... aside from monsters figuring out how to get to the Surface.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Foresight - Reimu Hakurei Elegant Shrine Maiden Robe
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Garden
description:
Stop the jealous witch Cloverana from Sabotaging your garden!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Paint Chase
description:
Rev your engines and color your way to victory in the local paint racing competition.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Ninpek
description:
It's Ninja time! Run and jump to reach the end of the world.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Bug Hunter
description:
The moon quarry has a bug problem and you've been hired to fix it.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Barbuta
description:
Explore the castle but watch out for traps!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Spot The Difference Food & Drink
description: Introducing Spot The Difference: Food and Drink, from the original creators of the globally famous Spot The Difference arcade game.

name: The Tag-along Obsession
description: The Tag-along Obsession is adapted from the movie "The Tag-along", based on the Urban Legend. It is a first-person horror puzzle adventure game, Players will play Hui-Ting and go into the situation to understand a series of supernatural phenomenon, and immerse themselves in the story, looking for the answers to everything.

name: Meteor Arena
description:
The new genre of multi-action games, “Party × Shooter,” is here!
Enjoy intense team battles packed into 90 seconds with simple movement controls and the game-changing “Meteor” attack!

name: Stars and Empires: Colony Defense
description: An RTS/Action 3rd person shooter that forces players to defend their base against waves of unknown threats of all kinds. Use strategy, unique abilities, tech research and combat skills to hold off any invaders.

name: Shut-in Vampire
description:
Oh no! Mayu’s in a pinch! She’s woefully behind on paying the rent, and her scary landlady, Miss Himemiya, has issued an ultimatum. Mayu needs to earn ¥100,000 by the end of October, or she’ll be kicked out!

Being evicted from her home would be bad enough, but Mayu has a secret: she’s actually a vampire. Mayu hasn’t been a vampire for a full year yet, and the church is keeping close tabs on her to ensure she’s been behaving herself. According to the stone-faced Sister Juriel, it’s the church’s standard policy to execute all vampires without a fixed address, lest they start roaming the streets causing chaos.

If Mayu can’t pay the rent in time, she won’t just wind up homeless: she’ll be executed! What’s a fledgeling vampire to do?

Assume control of Mayu and manage these tumultuous two weeks of her life. Help her raise money to avoid a grisly end, all while managing her stress levels and forming relationships with girls over the internet. You never know: come Halloween, Mayu might be able to land a date, and she might even get to nibble on a cute girl’s neck!

Do your best, and don’t let this upcoming Halloween be Mayu’s last! She’s counting on you!

name: Emiru Game
description: The First Rhythm game in where there is now over 30+ buttons pressed for each note on rhythm. Each song will feature songs by Marcus Owen Bell.

name: Ice Run
description: Your fast-paced penguin adventure.

name: Sound Horizons
description: Score unique melodies in this minimalist rhythm game. Experience a dynamic music that reacts to your actions, and try to survive until the end.

name: Slackers: Carts of Glory
description: Step into the wonderful world of Slackers! Picture this: you and your friends run out of drinks and the store is closing! Hop in a shopping cart, the ultimate eco-friendly marvel, master the art of riding an unpredictable beast, discover shortcuts as you pave your path to glory!

name: GT Manager
description: Take charge as the ultimate racing manager, leading your GT racing team to victory. Build your team, improve your car, and deploy winning race strategies across 5 official GT leagues, including the pinnacle of endurance racing: the hypercar category! Are you ready to dominate the world of GT racing?

name: Deadshot
description: Deadshot is a retro styled first person shooter inspired from classics like Half Life, Doom, Quake and many alike.

name: Rionag: Survey Fleet
description: Rionag: Survey Fleet is a top-down starship builder and logistics game where it's your job to balance the needs of the crews with cutting-edge equipment on board. Unlock tech that adds new capabilities for your ships to go through hazardous environments, enabling you to explore new worlds.

name: Shinehill
description: Yet again they dumped the toughest job on you. Now you are on a Shinehill Island, where you suddenly replaced one of the new residents. Explore the world, meet charming townspeople, do farming, fishing, cooking and try not to reveal yourself.

name: Endure Island
description: Survive on an ever-changing desert island! The goal of the player is to survive as long as possible on a deserted island, while keeping the changes under control. Keep the fight going by balancing the acquisition of weapons with keeping the changes on the deserted island in check.

name: Wild Indigo Ranch
description: Wild Indigo Ranch is a cozy cowboy-life RPG for 1-4 players. Start a new life on the prairie, explore the frontier, build the finest ranch in the West, and ride into the sunset.

name: Keylocker: Turn Based Cyberpunk Action
description: Keylocker is a Cyberpunk turn based rhythm JRPG inspired by the Mario&Luigi RPG series and Chrono Trigger, in which you play as the singer and songwriter, BOBO. Fuel your moves with the electric power of music in this unforgiving planet by using real-time execution of moves in rhythm game style! Battle the authorities, unlock the secrets of Saturn, play on your own bands' concerts and hack into the network to bring an end to this corrupt system, for better or worse.

name: Liberator TD
description: Liberator TD is a glorious mix of tower defense and top down shooter genres set in a sci-fi world. Tasked with the mission to establish a new colony on a distant planet, you find yourself in grave danger of the local wildlife.

name: UFO 50
description: UFO 50 is a collection of 50 single and multiplayer games from the creators of Spelunky, Downwell, Time Barons, Skorpulac, and Madhouse. Jump in and explore a variety of genres, from platformers and shoot 'em ups to puzzle games and RPGs. Our goal is to combine a familiar 8-bit aesthetic with new ideas and modern game design sensibilities.

name: Train Sim World 5: NEC - New York - Trenton
description: Experience the City that never sleeps. From the Big Apple to New Jersey suburbs, non-stop action awaits aboard premier electric traction. Serve the East Coast well with NJ TRANSIT and Amtrak passenger equipment, brought to life in Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: New York - Trenton.

name: Train Sim World 5: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln-Aachen
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed inter-city German rail as you push the throttle through bustling German Metropolis and the rolling open countryside in the exquisite Train Sim World 2: Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen.

name: Train Sim World 5: Semmeringbahn - Wiener Neustadt - Mürzzuschlag
description: Explore the World's first true mountain railway in Train Sim World 4! Drive trains at altitude through the rocky, forested peaks of the Austrian Alps. Climb the Semmering Pass before hastening downgrade towards historic Wiener Neustadt. Control iconic ÖBB traction on your Semmeringbahn adventure!

name: Train Sim World 5: Sherman Hill - Cheyenne - Laramie
description: All the grandeur of big-time, modern American freight railroading comes together on Union Pacific's legendary Sherman Hill for Train Sim World 3! Climb aboard the and potent SD70ACe and veteran SD40-2 diesel locomotives to forward tonnage between Cheyenne and Laramie, now with volumetric skies!

name: Train Sim World 5: London Overground Suffragette line - Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside
description: An Aventra Adventure awaits in Train Sim World 4! Discover North & East London boroughs aboard modern traction, traversing a newly electrified and extended line fit for future service. Become something of a driver yourself on the Suffragette line: Gospel Oak - Barking Riverside!

name: Train Sim World 5: Brighton Main Line: London Victoria - Brighton
description: Experience one of Britain's busiest main lines, from the nation's Capital to England's oldest coastal destination, via the international hub of Gatwick Airport. Whether Southern commuter or Gatwick Express, a flurry of passengers await in Train Sim World 2: London Commuter.

name: Train Sim World 5: Great Western Express
description: Train Sim World 2: Great Western Express brings to life the experience of driving high speed and commuter passenger trains on one of Britain's busiest railways. Take control of the iconic Great Western Railways HST and command it to 125mph along the Great Western Main Line out of London's Paddington Main Line Station.

name: Train Sim World 5: Free Starter Pack
description: Download the Train Sim World 5: Free Starter Pack to get access to the TRAINING CENTER, a tailor-made environment designed to train you up with the fundamentals of loco operations! Try your hand at mastering this introductory experience before discovering your favourite routes.

name: Train Sim World 5: Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim
description: Go cross-border and shuttle along the rural, hilly backdrops of Europe in Train Sim World 4. Take a trip back to the early 2010s and climb aboard the classic electric BR 111 - tap into Deutsche Bahn regional services between Germany and Austria with Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim!

name: Train Sim World 5: Avanti West Coast BR Class 390 Pendolino EMU
description: Tilt your way in and out of the capital on the busiest services in the UK. The Class 390 Pendolino swings into action with Train Sim World 5, sporting the teal and tango tones of Avanti West Coast, and racing along the thrilling West Coast Main Line!

name: Sker Ritual: Invasion of the Brain Eaters
description:
Take me to your leader! Invasion of the Brain Eaters is a cosmetic DLC pack for Sker Ritual!

This pack includes 4 exclusive cosmetic items:

Brain Eater Mask: A premium Brain Eater Mask
Distant Planet: A premium animated menu background of the Distant Planet
Braaaains!: A premium in-game voice line
Brain Eater Emblem: A premium Brain Eater player icon

name: Train Sim World 5: USA Regional Edition
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5: USA Regional Edition! The Sun-soaked tracks of the SAN BERNARDINO LINE play host to Metrolink movements, powered by the MP36 and F125. Connect the sprawling Greater LA metropolis and run to the foothills of the Cajon peaks.

name: Train Sim World 5: UK Regional Edition
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5: UK Regional Edition! Be swept off your feet with the commuter mayhem of the WEST COAST MAIN LINE. From the detailed cab of the Northwestern Class 350, operate semi-fast and commuter services between Euston and Milton Keynes.

name: Synnergy Games Bundle
description: Synnergy Circle Games Bundle. Get Alpacapaca Dash + Arrowstorm Ascendant

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24 Gold Edition
description: iRacing presents the Official Game of The World of Outlaws, featuring the World of Outlaws Sprint Car, Late Models and Super DIRTcar Big Block Modifieds, as well as 8 additional series including the all-new Micro Sprints, and many others.

name: Balatro: Special Edition
description: Balatro Special Edition Includes 10 physical versions of the in-game cards.

name: Midnight Dice
description:
Get ready for an electrifying dice game that blends luck and strategy in the neon-lit world of Midnight City.

Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned strategist, Midnight Dice offers endless fun and excitement. Are you bold enough to risk it all for the highest score?
Don't wait—download Midnight Dice now and start your journey to the top!

name: Train Sim World 5: German Regional Edition
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5: German Regional Edition! Variety abounds on the twisting KINZIGTALBAHN. Bank around the scenic Kinzig Valley aboard the tilting DB BR 411 ICE-T and haul freight with the mighty DB Vectron. it's all systems go between Frankfurt and Fulda.

name: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N.
description: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N. is a classic match-three puzzle game with a couple of clever twists. Similar to classics like Puzzle Bobble, the playing field is set before you start, and it’s your job to fire red, green, blue, purple, and yellow bubbles at the ones hovering above your porous yellow skull. You can bank shots off the walls, and you fire by holding your finger on the screen and pulling back.

name: Craig 12: Craig's Escape
description: Oh no! Craig was taken away! You must help him get to safety, or else...

name: Train Sim World 5: Deluxe Edition
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5: Deluxe Edition! Take on more challenges as you master more trains and iconic cities across 4 routes, additionally including the Avanti Class 390 Pendolino, FlixTrain Vectron and Cajon Pass.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Complete Edition
description:
The COMPLETE EDITION is a bundle containing the following:

Game Content:
- FINAL FANTASY XVI Base Game
- Echoes of the Fallen DLC
- The Rising Tide DLC

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Complete Upgrade Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Two Thrones Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Dark Prince Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Mister Mosquito
description: Sin descripción

name: SkyGunner
description: Sin descripción

name: Typingcommand
description: In Typingcommand, you have to defend the Earth from a continuous stream of asteroids. Asteroids fall from the sky, threatening to destroy everything in their path. Your task is to destroy asteroids before they reach the surface of the planet.

name: Reflector Satellites
description: In Reflector Satellites, you play as a space defender fighting off an endless number of enemy ships. Your opponents are ships of three colors: red, blue and yellow. Use mirrors to redirect your shots and destroy enemies more effectively.

name: Secret Agent Clank
description:
A port of Secret Agent Clank, a platform video game developed by High Impact Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment, released for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) in 2008.

In the game, Clank dons his "Secret Agent Clank" persona, which was previously seen in brief TV show segments within the main series. The story revolves around Clank working to clear Ratchet's name after Ratchet is framed for a crime he did not commit. The gameplay diverges from the traditional Ratchet & Clank format, focusing more on stealth and gadget-based play, though it retains the series' trademark humour and style.

The port is enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Lord of Nazarick
description: Based on the popular anime, “OVERLORD,” this game lets you command your own army of powerful guardians, villains, and other characters.

name: WWII Airplane Fight: Battle War Squad - Master
description: Sin descripción

name: WWII Airplane Fight: Battle War Squad - Cash Injection
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Complete Edition
description: Discover the critically acclaimed Metroidvania with the Complete Edition, including the base game, the Mask of Darkness Story DLC, 3 outfits for Sargon, the Prosperity Bird Amulet, and a digital adventure guide. Manipulate time and space, master acrobatic combat, and engage in epic boss battles.

name: Contra Run & Gun Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Las Aventuras de Frank el Enano
description: Sin descripción

name: Seed of Heroes
description: Seed of Heroes is a bullet heaven game where players take on the role of warriors seeking glorious battles and get into the halls of Valhalla. Journey through various realms, take on hordes of enemies, collect treasures, and defeat bosses that will try to stop you. Pass the trials and tribulations and prepare for the Ragnarok.

name: Resurrection: Nuke island - Weapons Pack
description: This pack includes guns, grenades, scopes additionally to join mission with Roman

name: MultiVersus: Season 3 - Sugar, Spice & Everything Nice!
description: Season 3 comes to MultiVersus with a dash of Chemical X from the Powerpuff Girls! All the way from Themyscira, Nubia joins the heroic line-up Mid-Season.

name: Survivors of the Three Kingdoms
description: A barrage shooting game similar to vampire survivors, using a hand-drawn style, allowing players to enter the troubled times of the Three Kingdoms and see how long they can last.

name: Adventure of the Bucket
description: Embark on an adventure with the Iron Bucket and Wooden Bucket! Adventure of the Bucket is a cooperative multiplayer game where you control buckets connected by a spring to solve stages. Don't worry, you can play solo too!

name: AboFlah-intelliFinish
description: Puzzle game on a difficult level. Start disassembling and assembling puzzles to reach the finish line

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24
description:
iRacing presents the Official Game of The World of Outlaws, featuring the World of Outlaws Sprint Car, Late Models and Super DIRTcar Big Block Modifieds, as well as 8 additional series including the all-new Micro Sprints, and many others.

World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24 features 49 tracks, including all your favorites like Eldora Speedway, Knoxville Raceway, and Volusia Speedway Park, with new additions like Kevin Harvick’s Kern Raceway, and Millbridge Speedway.

Become a LEGEND like Donny Schatz as you work your way through Career Mode in your quest to best his 10-time National Champion status. With so many combinations of cars, tracks, and experiences, your path to victory will be unique! And, don’t forget to check out the all new challenge mode where you can test your skills against Donny himself! Are you Outlaw Tough? It’s the Greatest Show on Dirt!

name: Train Sim World 5
description: The Rails are Yours in Train Sim World 5! Take on new challenges and new roles as you master the tracks and trains of iconic cities across 3 new routes. Immerse yourself in the ultimate rail hobby and embark on your next journey.

name: Eye of the Commando
description: A turnbased grid movement dungeon crawler with an 80s action movie theme. Players raid an island fortress of evil, fighting, exploring, gearing up, and solving puzzles.

name: Domus Abscondita
description: Domus Abscondita is single player horror and mystery adventure. Step into the shoes of a private investigator and try to uncover all the secrets of the Manor. Will you escape with the truth, or will you become another lost soul within its haunted halls?

name: Femdom Game World: Stacy
description: Femdom Game World: Stacy is a visual novel with a deep plot, designed for an adult audience. Finding yourself in the role of a student, you will have to win a bet: to seduce your pretty teacher. But who would have thought that the young teacher will turn out to be a strict and ruthless Mistress?

name: You Struck Gold
description: Stranded on a mining planet, your escape hinges on quarrying gold. Solve challenging puzzles by using unique card abilities to uncover riches and escape in this strategic, card-based puzzle game!

name: Mr.Robbo
description: Mr.Robbo is a 2D logic game with action elements in the style of the 80s. Collect all the bots, clear the way to your flying saucer and try not to die from enemies, guns or magnets. 64 exciting levels await you. Good luck =)

name: Cyber Tunnel Escape
description: Immersive 6 degree of freedom 1000kmh+ high speed flying experience! Drive fast and carefully to survive from a plasma blast as long as you can. Over 2000 different styled tunnels to explore! Support PC & Meta Quest VR.

name: Cyberwave
description: Fight Endless Waves of Cyber-Mutants in an ever evolving combat simulation.

name: Tidy Backpack
description: Tidy Backpack is a relaxing puzzle game where you must organize found fantasy loot in your backpack in a tidy way. Find forgotten artifacts and learn details about the old world... at least supposedly!

name: Hidden Cats Invade Venice
description: Hidden Cats Invade Venice is a hidden object game, where you have to find 400 cute little kittens hidden in the magnificent city of Venice in 3D. A peaceful, colorful game for all ages.

name: Hide The Corpse
description:
Hide the Corpse is a VR physics-based game where players must hide a body within four minutes across six distinct environments, including a zero-gravity spaceship and an underwater shipwreck.

With quirky humor and immersive gameplay, players will face chaotic fun as they erase evidence and solve creative puzzles. Now featuring a sandbox mode, unlockable levels, and hilarious character skins, Hide the Corpse delivers fast-paced thrills and endless laughs.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Mask of Darkness
description: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown's tale of monsters, mythology, and Immortals left one conspicuous thread unresolved: the fate of the mysterious masked Immortal, Radjen. When the Mask of Darkness DLC launches on September 17, players can discover a new chapter of Sargon's story as they confront the myriad dangers of Radjen's Mind Palace. But the new DLC is much more than a story expansion, opening up a whole new biome filled with fresh traversal elements, traps, enemies, and more.

name: Nightrunner
description: Buckle up in this minimalist retro arcade high score chaser.

name: Heroes of Latera
description: Heroes of Latera is a 3d fantasy style survivor based in the realm of Latera. Explore unique classes each with their own individual abilities and play styles. Fight through the endless waves of Eu'roks hoard as you amass wealth, experience, and a pile of bodies.

name: Kitty's Last Adventure
description: In this wave-based roguelite auto shooter, play as Kitty the cat aboard her flying cat-saucer created by her distraught human.

name: Resurrection: Nuke Island
description: An alarm raised when CIA found that 8 scientists are missing from international virology conference. CIA started investigation and found that North Korean scientists are also missing and suspected North Koreans. Roman, special ops commando has to evacuate scientists from North Korea.

name: Machinika: Atlas
description: Machinika: Atlas is an indie puzzle game and is the direct sequel to Machinika: Museum, you play as a museum researcher who just land on Atlas. Will you unravel the mysteries of the alien vessel? Solve cryptic puzzles to find out what happened!

name: Legend of the Wargod
description: A dark fantasy epic RPG with turn-based combat, with an emphasis on strategy and survival. Aid Zieg in his quest to recover his stolen voice and unfold the Legends of Aeasyn.

name: Repent
description: Robert Watford, a retierd cop with a troubled past, starts his first day as a night shift guard which unbeknown to him, would directly implicate him into a series of paranormal events revolving around a secretive cult with evil intentions.

name: Subside
description: Subside is an immersive aquatic VR experience with multiple areas to explore and lifelike aquatic creatures to interact with. Crafted with unparalleled realism, it aims to replicate the nuances of real-life swimming and diving in shallow waters

name: Fera: The Sundered Tribes
description: Fera: The Sundered Tribes is an enthralling mixture of monster hunting action RPG with village building and tribe management in a unique post-apocalyptic fantastical world of untamed magic and ancient secrets.

name: Medieval Delivery
description: Because deliveries also existed in medieval times, this is a third-person simulation and adventure game where you'll have the task of making deliveries throughout the village according to the requests of its inhabitants, such as meat, flour, bread, and perhaps other things.

name: FatalZone
description: FatalZone is an auto shooter with roguelike and RPG elements set in a savage world of zombies. Exterminate zombie hordes, collect resources, upgrade your camp, and level up mercenaries. Humanity must survive at any cost!

name: Goblin Camp
description: Goblin Camp is a fantasy city-building game inspired by Finnish mythology. Deep simulation mechanics capture the unique challenges of surviving the harsh winters and carving a thriving settlement out of the northern forest. Lead your goblins to greatness!

name: Times Dungeon
description: It is a game that appeals to everyone who wants to spend time with its simple, fast gameplay focused on action and adventure, set in a fantastic universe. It's time to go on an adventure with its side scroller and unique graphics.

name: Marko: Beyond Brave
description: Explore the mysterious land of Zagora in this action-packed platformer. Wander through lush forests, crumbling castles, battle corrupted creatures, and escape intricate traps. Jump, slash and shoot your way through challenging foes and mighty bosses inspired by Slavic myths.

name: The Plucky Squire
description: Storybook characters discover a three-dimensional world outside the pages of their book and must jump between 2D & 3D realms to save their friends in this charming action-adventure.

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprout Valley: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Catwifhat
description: Catwifhat is a clicker game where, by clicking on an adorable cat in a hat, you earn even more cats in various styles! Every 3 hours in the game, you receive a unique cat. Join us, have fun, and help us create something amazing!

name: My Little Sister Callie
description: My Little Sister Callie is a visual novel about a brother helping his little sister to adapt to life outside of a refugee camp. How far will you go to bring her home?

name: Pacific Drive: Anomalous Customization Pack
description: Navigate the post-apocalyptic landscape with style like never before with Pacific Drive: Anomalous Customization Pack that adds new anomaly themed cosmetic items for your station wagon.

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: New Puzzle Story - Nothing Personal
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai World: Ultra Premium
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyberpunk Hacker
description: Are you ready to disrupt the cybernetic order and unveil the secrets at the heart of the neon-drenched horizon?

name: Funeralopolis: Last Days
description:
The city of Huta-Grobno hasn't seen sunlight in months after strange clouds enveloped the skies above it. Something’s brewing in the air… and underneath the surface.

This is a story oriented and text heavy game with a linear structure, featuring light horror elements.

name: The Factory Must Grow
description: The Factory Must Grow is a 3D first-person factory builder where you mine resources, craft machines, and research technology. Begin by unlocking your first technology, then expand into a sprawling, multi-layered production empire. From small setups to massive systems, your imagination is the only limit!

name: Mannequin Machine
description: "Mannequin machine" is a first-person psychological horror game with camera effects that tells the story of working in a mannequin factory. Beware of the evil at the heart of the plant, it drives its victims crazy

name: Diluvian Ultra: Awakening
description:
Diluvian Ultra: Awakening shows a never-before seen part of Diluvian Ultra's story, preceding the events of the main game. As a young Diluvian Knight, stage a heroic defense against insurmountable odds, in this single-player FPS with a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat.

Witness the events preceding the story of Diluvian Ultra in this free, stand-alone FPS. Embody a young Diluvian Knight, Qasar, and face the brutal Myrmidon invasion of your tomb-ship. Find and protect the sarcophagus of Attila, your Lord, and ensure he survives to set in motion the events of Diluvian Ultra.

Featuring a brand-new level, new characters, story and dialogues, Diluvian Ultra: Awakening is an excellent introduction for new explorers of the game’s universe, as well as an interesting new addition to veterans who have already completed the first chapter of Diluvian Ultra.

name: Super World of Goo
description: A Physics Puzzler where you build gooey structures to reach pneumatic pipes.

name: Cramunhão: A Sigil Tribute
description: Cramunhão is a tribute to John Romero's Sigil. It replaces the 4th episode of The Ultimate Doom. Inspired by the works of John Romero on Sigil, it started out as a single maps contest emulating the mechanics of Sigil, but ended up evolving into a full episode community project. It has contributions from well known mappers such as Daniel (NeoDoom, Final NeoDoom) and Deadwing (Ozonia, Moonblood), just as newcomers like Sca, who has made his first map ever for this mod (and also one inspired in the hospital his first son was born, at that very day).

name: Joy
description:
Joy is a unique 2D horror game that blends unsettling mini-games with chilling cutscenes. What begins as an innocent experience quickly turns sinister, drawing you into a dark, unpredictable journey filled with unexpected scares. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of tension and suspense that keeps you on edge from start to finish. Are you ready to face the fear and discover the hidden terrors within JoY?

Prepare for a haunting experience like no other.

name: 1-2-Whopping Word Search!
description: 1-2-Whopping Word Search is sequel to "1-2-Word Search!" packed with all new features! This game now utilizes multiple grid sizes for both large and small puzzles. Each level now has a hidden word to find that will unlock new music, and there are more than 10 new background themes that completely change the look and feel of the game. 1-2-Whopping Word Search! is classic word search puzzle game with a TreeFall twist! Embark on a fun and relaxing journey solving word searches while listening to the TreeFall Radio!

name: Magical School Girls Battle Arena
description: Collect characters with unique skills and win the arena! Find the optimal formation from three characters randomly selected for each round.

name: Dragon Spirits 2
description: In this modern urban-themed RPG, you can collect nearly a hundred different dragon spirits, experiment with skill setups, assemble teams, and devise strategies to build your dragon spirit squad. Adventure through the virtual spaces in Metapolis, and uncover the conspiracy behind it all.

name: Everspace 2: Titans
description: Dreadnought and Leviathan have arrived in Cluster 34. Titans brings new story and massive repeatable challenges to EVERSPACE 2. Discover two exciting storylines alongside a cast of new and returning characters!

name: Fairy Tail: Beach Volleyball Havoc
description: The cast of Fairy Tail is ready to bring mayhem to the summertime beaches! Unleash over-the-top magic to BLAST that volleyball!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Stuttgart
description: Airport Stuttgart XP brings the international airport of the state capital of Baden-Wuerttemberg as a native add-on to the flight simulator X-Plane 12.

name: Tails Noir: Rebel Rush
description: Speedrunning precision platformer where you jump on buildings and invent crazy shortcuts to become the fastest driver in the city!

name: The Spell Brigade
description: The Spell Brigade is an online co-op survivors-like for 1-4 players. Team up with your wizard friends to slay hordes of dark creatures. Complete team-based objectives, unlock new upgrades and create overpowered spell synergies. Friend nor foe is safe in this friendly fire bullet hell!

name: Baby Blues Nightmares: Toddler Horror Game
description: Baby Blues Nightmare is a survival horror stealth game where you play as a toddler going into a little adventure with your tricycle which you can fix, maintain and customize. Paddle, hide and survive but remember; try not to cry when you are scared.. or the monsters will hear you and get you.

name: Witching Stone
description: Witching Stone is a puzzle game matched with a deckbuilder! Customise your spellbook and weave spells with coloured stones.

name: Voids Vigil
description: Blast your way through robotic hordes in this auto-battler arena shooter. Use auto-firing guns and drones, timely dashes and special abilities to reach The Void where a randomly constructed final Conservator awaits convergence. Spend your Cogs wisely among the shops to create unique builds!

name: Hands of Necromancy II
description: “Hands of Necromancy 2” is a sequel to the original “Hands of Necromancy” game; a dark fantasy first-person shooter that draws parallels with games like “Heretic” and “Doom”. As a player, you’ll discover various weapons and unique transformation abilities to combat the monsters you encounter.

name: Undergod
description: Take over heaven in this airborne-combat roguelike where you fight hordes of angels while growing stronger every minute.

name: Blood Lily Loop
description: Your bestie seems to be hiding something. There's something about your world that seems odd as well, like it has...secrets. Dive into the time loop of this horror game and witness a "friendship" that rewrites the world.

name: American Truck Simulator: Arkansas
description: Located in the south-central region of the United States, the state is a nature wonderland with three national forests, many State Parks, nearly 9,000 miles of pristine streams and rivers like the Arkansas and Mississippi, as well as the ever-stretching Ozark and Quachita mountain ranges.

name: Scary Loop
description: A bone-chilling point-and-click horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Prepare to navigate through a nightmarish landscape filled with jumpscares, sinister puzzles, and terrifying creatures that will test your wits and nerves like never before.

name: Auto Sale Life
description: Build an automotive empire. Buy, sell, and customize cars to create your own brands and showrooms. Become a shrewd entrepreneur in this immersive car trading and customization game.

name: Foresia: The Cursed Oath
description: Foresia is a rare High Elf living in the Spirit Tree Forest. Suddenly, monsters set fire to her village and Foresia is captured and enslaved. With the help of the spirit, she manages to escape but is plagued by a curse she cannot resist.
